definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: A new scheme of NC system for hydraulic turret lathe is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 給出一種液壓轉塔車牀數控系統的改造設計方案。

sentences.english: This paper puts forward a new kind of turret.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一新型轉塔刀架的結構。
